forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain transitioning to a few showers late. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 45F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 65F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 47F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 76F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 22C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 70F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. Areas of fog developing after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High around 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 60F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
